articles.title: Leaks Suggest Samsung's New Foldables Could Be Priced Closer to a Standard Phone
articles.description: Earlier this week, Samsung officially announced that its next Unpacked event will take place on August 11, and now due to a recent leak, we may have just gotten a much better idea of how much all of Samsung’s new gadgets will cost a few weeks early. Read more…

articles.author: Molly Taft
articles.title: Smoke Plume From Western Wildfires Stretches 2,600 Miles to Greenland
articles.description: Satellite images show that smoke has traveled thousands of miles from fires burning in the Pacific Northwest and California to reach the skies of Greenland. It’s expected to keep moving east, and impacts from the West’s raging wildfire season may soon be felt…
